sectionOne.title: Meet Your Trainer
sectionOne.shortDescription: Mr. Naresh, a seasoned Salesforce professional with over 10 years of hands-on experience in Salesforce CRM and custom development, has been instrumental in delivering scalable and innovative solutions across various business domains. His deep knowledge of Salesforce administration, Apex programming, Lightning components, and automation tools has helped organizations optimize their CRM systems. His passion for teaching and mentoring makes him the ideal guide for those aspiring to master Salesforce. With a focus on practical implementation, Mr. Naresh bridges the gap between theoretical learning and real-time practices.

faqs.question: What Modules Are Covered in Salesforce Online Training?
faqs.answer: Our Salesforce Training covers essential modules including Unified CRM Platform, Intuitive User Interface, Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, Marketing Cloud, Commerce Cloud, Einstein AI, Productivity Tools, and AppExchange. This hands-on training equips you with the skills needed to work confidently with Salesforce development and administration. A detailed syllabus is provided in our course brochure.

faqs.question: What Is the Course Schedule?
faqs.answer: Live training sessions are conducted Monday to Saturday, 1 hour per day. This structured schedule ensures steady learning and practical experience in Salesforce.

faqs.question: Are Weekend Batches Available?
faqs.answer: Currently, weekend-only batches are not available. Classes are conducted from Monday through Saturday for consistent skill-building in Salesforce.

faqs.question: Do You Offer Self-Paced Learning?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer recorded sessions for self-paced learning. Please note, live Q&A support is not available in the self-paced format for Salesforce training.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Internship Opportunities?
faqs.answer: Yes, internships are provided based on mock evaluation performance. Internships involve real-time project work using Salesforce modules such as Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, and AppExchange.

faqs.question: Can I Download the Training Videos?
faqs.answer: Downloads are not available through the web portal, but you’ll have secure access to all session recordings for 1 year. However, if you’re using our mobile learning app, you can download up to 20 videos to watch offline—ideal for learning without internet access.

faqs.question: Can I Enroll in a Single Module Instead of the Full Course?
faqs.answer: No. Salesforce Training is offered as a complete package to ensure a thorough understanding of all essential modules and best practices.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Resume Preparation Support?
faqs.answer: Yes. We offer resume building guidance focused on Salesforce roles, emphasizing your hands-on project experience with Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, and CRM Customizations.

faqs.question: Is a Laptop or Desktop Required for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes. A personal computer is required to install and practice using the Salesforce environment, including modules like Sales Cloud and AppExchange development.

faqs.question: Are There Any Prerequisites for This Training?
faqs.answer: No prior experience is needed. This Salesforce course is beginner-friendly. Basic understanding of programming or CRM systems is an advantage but not mandatory.

faqs.question: Do You Teach from the Basics?
faqs.answer: Yes. We begin with foundational concepts such as Unified CRM and Salesforce Basics before progressing to advanced Salesforce topics like Marketing Cloud, Einstein AI, and AppExchange.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Job Placement Assistance?
faqs.answer: Yes. We offer full placement support including mock interviews, interview prep, and resume optimization tailored to Salesforce roles.

faqs.question: Do You Offer Salesforce Certification Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide expert guidance and study resources to help you prepare for Salesforce certification exams.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Training Recordings and Study Materials?
faqs.answer: Yes. You’ll have 1-year access to all recordings and receive comprehensive notes, development guides, and reference documents covering Salesforce modules.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Interview Questions and Mock Support?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We provide targeted interview questions and conduct mock interviews focused on Salesforce to prepare you for real job roles.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Instance Access for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes. You’ll get 4 months of Salesforce system access with support for practicing modules like Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, and Productivity Tools.

faqs.question: Can I Retake the Course?
faqs.answer: Yes. You can rejoin any future batch of Salesforce Training within your 1-year course access period at no additional cost.

faqs.question: Will I Get a Course Completion Certificate?
faqs.answer: Yes. Upon completing the training, you’ll receive an official Salesforce Training Certificate from Tech Leads IT.

faqs.question: Is Coding Knowledge Required?
faqs.answer: Basic knowledge of programming is helpful. We cover all technical aspects from the ground up with practical Salesforce exercises.

faqs.question: Is One-on-One Training Available?
faqs.answer: Yes, one-on-one sessions are available upon request. Fees for personalized Salesforce training vary based on the schedule.
